description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Container Manager Service elevation of privilege vulnerability (CVE-2024-30076):

1. Download and apply the KB5039212 update from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Restart your system to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update specifically addresses elevation of privilege issues caused by improper link resolution.
- For manual installations, download the relevant update packages from:
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
  - Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5039213](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039213).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is one of the affected build numbers: 10.0.19043.4529, 10.0.22631.3737, or 10.0.22000.3019.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
